alert.note: Alert for Covington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:09AM CDT until June 18 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN COVINGTON AND SOUTHWESTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 809 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Seminary, or near Collins, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Seminary around 820 AM CDT. Sanford around 825 AM CDT. Moselle and Eastabuchie around 840 AM CDT. Laurel and Ellisville around 845 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
